title: Disable test_multi_drop on Windows
body_html:
test_multi_drop is known to cause intermittent CUDA out-of-memory error on Windows:

  • https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1786/console
  • https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1698/console
  • https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1676/console

Disabling it now until we find a proper fix. Added to #4092.

body:
`test_multi_drop` is known to cause intermittent CUDA out-of-memory error on Windows: 

- https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1786/console
- https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1698/console
- https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1676/console

Disabling it now until we find a proper fix. Added to https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/4092.
